about_the_game:
UNDISCLOSED is a 1-4 player co-op horror game where you play as an FBI agent investigating paranormal events in the 1950s USA. Interact with witnesses, uncover hidden truths, and prepare to face unexplained threats.

BRIEFING

Reports of strange occurrences are flooding in from every corner of the country.

Your mission, agents, is simple: investigate, gather information, and neutralize any threats. Keep everything under wraps—especially when dealing with witnesses. No information will leave this operation.

The safety of our nation is in your hands. Stay sharp.

IMMERSIVE INVESTIGATION EXPERIENCE

  • Full Immersion in the Agent's Role: The minimalist interface keeps you focused on the investigationand puts you in the shoes of an FBI agent fully immersed in the case.

  • Witnesses: Use a variety of methods to extract information from witnesses or suspects, including interrogation and threats. Some situations can’t be resolved peacefully—be prepared for unpredictable reactions. And what if they're not human anymore?

  • On-Site Investigation: Collect evidence, conduct searches, and break into homes to gather key information. Every action you take will either help you solve the case or simply survive...

SECRET FILES: PARANORMAL THREATS

  • Intriguing Cases: Each mission is a stand-alone, unique story inspired by iconic paranormal plots.

  • Unique Mechanics: Each threat is a unique challenge with mechanics that force you to adapt your tactics and approach to solving the problem.

REPLAYABILITY FACTORS

  • Randomized Investigations: Loot, building conditions, witnesses, and evidence are randomly generated for each mission, ensuring that no two cases feel the same.

  • Dynamic Boss Encounters: Boss encounter strategies include unpredictable elements, that require players to stay on their toes and adapt in real time.

COOPERATIVE

  • Designed for Cooperative Play: The game’s mechanics are built to encourage teamwork, with players taking on complementary roles to achieve common goals.

  • Immersive Voice Chat: The in-game voice system takes into account obstacles and distance, providing realistic and engaging communication during missions.

content_descriptors.notes: Undisclosed contains depictions of gore, violence, disturbing imagery, psychological horror themes, and strong language.

name: UNDISCLOSED

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10\11 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti \ AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10\11 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 \ AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 Super \ AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: UNDISCLOSED is a 1-4 player co-op horror game where you play as an FBI agent investigating paranormal events in the 1950s USA. Interact with witnesses, uncover hidden truths, and prepare to face unexplained threats. Some things are better left undisclosed.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Korean, Ukrainian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
